dcterms:creator: X.S. Yang
dcterms:description: The firefly algorithm is a nature-inspired optimization algorithm that has been significantly developed since its introduction. It is used for various optimization problems and is characterized by its nonlinear attraction mechanism.
dcterms:title: Firefly Algorithm

dcterms:creator: I. Fister
I. Fister
X.S. Yang
J. Brest
dcterms:description: A comprehensive review of firefly algorithms, discussing various variants and their applications in optimization problems.
dcterms:title: Firefly Algorithm Variants

dcterms:creator: M.K. Marichelvam
T. Prabaharan
X.S. Yang
dcterms:description: A discrete firefly algorithm designed to solve multi-objective hybrid flowshop scheduling problems, enhancing the application of firefly algorithms in discrete optimization.
dcterms:title: Discrete Firefly Algorithm

dcterms:creator: A.H. Gandomi
X.S. Yang
S. Talatahari
A.H. Alavi
dcterms:description: A chaotic firefly algorithm that incorporates chaos theory to enhance the exploration capabilities of the standard firefly algorithm.
dcterms:title: Chaotic Firefly Algorithm

dcterms:creator: X.S. Yang
dcterms:description: A multiobjective firefly algorithm designed for continuous optimization problems, extending the capabilities of the standard firefly algorithm to handle multiple objectives.
dcterms:title: Multiobjective Firefly Algorithm

dcterms:creator: J.S. Chou
N.T. Ngo
dcterms:description: A modified firefly algorithm tailored for multidimensional optimization problems in structural design, enhancing the standard firefly algorithm's applicability in engineering.
dcterms:title: Modified Firefly Algorithm

dcterms:creator: A. Baykasoglu
F.B. Ozsoydan
dcterms:description: An adaptive firefly algorithm that incorporates chaos for mechanical design optimization problems, allowing for dynamic parameter adjustments.
dcterms:title: Adaptive Firefly Algorithm

dcterms:creator: M. Alweshah
S. Abdullah
dcterms:description: A hybrid firefly algorithm that combines firefly algorithms with probabilistic neural networks for solving classification problems.
dcterms:title: Hybrid Firefly Algorithm

dcterms:creator: T. Kanimozhi
K. Latha
dcterms:description: An integrated approach to region-based image retrieval using the firefly algorithm and support vector machine, demonstrating the application of firefly algorithms in image processing.
dcterms:title: Firefly Algorithm for Image Processing

dcterms:creator: H. Ghorbani
J. Moghadasi
D.A. Wood
dcterms:description: A firefly algorithm applied to predict gas flow rates from gas condensate reservoirs through wellhead chokes, showcasing the algorithm's utility in energy systems.
dcterms:title: Firefly Algorithm for Energy Systems
